import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import Logo from "../assets/logo.png" export const Headers = () => { const [theme, setTheme] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("theme")) || "dark") useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem("theme", JSON.stringify(theme)) document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class") document.documentElement.classList.add(theme) }, [theme]) return (
ToDoMate
setTheme("light")} className= {theme === "light" ? "light activeTheme" : "light"}> setTheme("medium")} className= {theme === "medium" ? "medium activeTheme" : "medium"}> setTheme("dark")} className= {theme === "dark" ? "dark activeTheme" : "dark"}> setTheme("gOne")} className= {theme === "gOne" ? "gOne activeTheme" : "gOne"}> setTheme("gTwo")} className= {theme === "gTwo" ? "gTwo activeTheme" : "gTwo"}> setTheme("gThree")} className= {theme === "gThree" ? "gThree activeTheme" : "gThree"}>
) }
